# insertTitlebarAccessoryViewController(_:at:)

**Instance Method**

Inserts the view controller into the window’s array of title bar accessory view controllers at the specified index.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func insertTitlebarAccessoryViewController(_ childViewController: NSTitlebarAccessoryViewController, at index: Int)
```

## Parameters

- **childViewController**: The title bar accessory view controller to insert.
- **index**: The index at which to insert `childViewController`.

## Managing Title Bar Accessories

- **addTitlebarAccessoryViewController(_:)**: Adds the specified title bar accessory view controller to the window.
- **removeTitlebarAccessoryViewController(at:)**: Removes the view controller at the specified index from the window’s array of title bar accessory view controllers.
- **titlebarAccessoryViewControllers**: An array of title bar accessory view controllers that are currently added to the window.
